body:
Advertised shortcut type would attempt to 'repair' Spack to its install condition if modifications through git or otherwise were made.

In order to test this, make sure old shortcuts are completely removed. The advertised shortcut might remain after regular uninstall. Shortcuts on windows live in `%appdata%\roaming\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu`
title: replace advertised shortcuts to prevent 'repair' of modified spack
